definition: the Daoist doctrine of inaction/let things take their own course/laissez-faire
Wuwei county in Chaohu 巢湖[Chao2 hu2], Anhui
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
unaccomplished/mediocre/feckless
Wuwei county in Chaohu 巢湖[Chao2 hu2], Anhui

sentences.english: As a result, many people live a mediocre life without living for a true purpose.
sentences.chinese: 结果很多人一生碌碌无为，没有真正的目标。

sentences.english: Keep the mind pure and undefiled. Remain calm and serene always.
sentences.chinese: 守住清净无为的心，让心时时寂静。

sentences.english: If we are tense, then the doing of the nothing is really for naught.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们很紧张，想无为简直是痴人说梦。

sentences.english: Laozi's thought of inaction is the best expression in the process of psychotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 无为自化思想是治疗过程的最佳体现。

sentences.english: The costs of inaction are too great.
sentences.chinese: 这种无为的的代价太大了。

sentences.english: There is a concept in Taoism called ‘Wu Wei.’
sentences.chinese: 在道家学说里有种理念叫做无为。

sentences.english: Having known a little bit of Haowen, I can feel the "inaction" of the cultural atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 了解浩文，可以感受到老子“无为”思想的文化氛围。

sentences.english: Because Buddha and Jesus emphasise effort and Chuang Tzu emphasises effortlessness.
sentences.chinese: 因为佛陀与耶稣主张有为，而庄子强调的是无为。

sentences.english: One crowded hour of glorious life is worth an age without a name. www. 18fu.
sentences.chinese: net光辉生活中忙迫的一个小时抵得上无为的一世。

sentences.english: My sympathies is with wisl who struggle for justice.
sentences.chinese: 我的怜惜心是向着所无为正义而搏斗的人们的。

sentences.english: In reality life, alone in the world of coexistence.
sentences.chinese: 真人淡泊无为，独于天地共存。

sentences.english: It is unlikely that Singaporeans would be comfortable with the laissez-faire politics of Hyde Park Corner.
sentences.chinese: 海德公园式的“无为”政治，我们是不习惯的。

sentences.english: As for the wave is mediocre, and hard work is wise move.
sentences.chinese: 碌碌无为是庸人所为，奋发图强是智者之举。

sentences.english: The last part of the dissertation analyses the economic pattern of noninterference at the early Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 论文最后对汉初无为模式进行实证分析。

sentences.english: He tooks a hors-off approach when it gos to raising his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他用无为而治的方法教养小孩。
